description: Updates the information for an ActiveMQ user.

parameters.name: BrokerId
parameters.description: The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the broker.

parameters.name: Groups
parameters.description: The list of groups (20 maximum) to which the ActiveMQ user belongs. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 2-100 characters long. (string) ---

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username of the ActiveMQ user. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 2-100 characters long.
